title: Theism vs. Non-Theism, Personal vs. Impersonal, Miraculous vs. Unconscious, Context vs. Technique
description:
While I've experienced strange hesitation "our little corner of the Internet" has had a wealth of great conversations. JP Marceau, Mary Kochan, and John Vervaeke had an amazing 2 hour conversation where they not only modeled effective, loving, productive, explorative conversation but they really did some work on drawing out the lines of difference between the religious and the post-religious dynamics of moral life. What a triumph! This on top of an amazing conversation between John Vervaeke and Jonathan Pageau. 

Hesitation video C: https://youtu.be/7LbCZ4_Wmkw

Video B https://youtu.be/lokTsmmpAWM

Video A https://youtu.be/nAsNwskEHHQ

JP John and Mary on JP's channel https://youtu.be/DCaKxIZFw7Y
JP John and Mary on Mary's channel https://youtu.be/znNqRYSKB7k
Vervaeke and Pageau https://youtu.be/N1byG4RqoTg
Philosopher Julian Young and the Meaning Crisis https://youtu.be/B-62c5x4vvc
Christine Hayes and the MetaDivine Realm https://youtu.be/wRPqtGywkCw
Arul Emergence "Get out of Jail Free Card" https://youtu.be/qzSpDbAyUvg
SacWriter Can't Believe in Inerrancy https://mikeinsac.com/2019/09/02/my-struggle-to-believe-in-a-bible-without-errors/
Why Relate to a God Personally https://youtu.be/65CcfvXXHug
Peter Kreeft The Dark Side https://www.catholiceducation.org/en/religion-and-philosophy/philosophy/suffering.html
